Complete Web Accessibility Audit Services

Kaffeinated Kodemonkey—your trusted partner for ADA, WCAG 2.2, and Section 508 compliance. Ensure your website meets federal ada standards and provides an inclusive user experience across all states. Our DHS Certified Trusted Tester team delivers comprehensive solutions to achieve and maintain compliance, avoiding legal risks and enhancing usability.

Frequently Asked Questions

Here are answers to the most commonly asked questions about Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG).

It makes websites usable for all, meeting ADA/WCAG standards to ensure access and avoid legal risks.

Adhering to Americans with Disabilities Act guidelines, ensuring sites are navigable for those with disabilities.

Proof your site meets ADA/WCAG standards, protecting against legal issues.

Better site structure and usability boost rankings—accessible sites gain up to 15% higher click-through rates.

Colorado’s law mandates WCAG 2.1 AA for public entities, with post-July 2025 fines up to $3,500/violation.
